use serde::{Deserialize, Serialize};
use std::fmt::Debug;

pub type PaymentResult<T> = Result<T, PaymentError>;

#[derive(Debug, Clone, PartialEq, Eq, Serialize, Deserialize)]
pub enum PaymentError {
    ProviderError(String),
    NetworkError(String),
    ConfigError(String),
    NotFound(String),
    Cancelled,
    Failed(String),
}

    pub payment_id: String,
    pub amount: u64,
    pub
